owner.name: Fazle Rabbi Zaki
owner.title: Aerospace Engineer
owner.tagline: Controls, sensing, and hardware testing. I build, test, and verify.
owner.about: I design and test flight-like systems at small scale. I like clean interfaces, repeatable tests, and simple models backed by data.
aboutBullets: Controls and sensing for small platforms (ADCS, IMU fusion)
Hardware bring-up, test jigs, and data analysis

projects.title: CubeSat ADCS Imaging Testbed (1U)
projects.summary: Built a 1U ADCS testbed (~0.95 kg, 10×10×15 cm) integrating dual ICM-20948 9-DoF IMUs, IR sun sensor, star tracker camera, science camera, reaction wheel, and magnetorquers. Implemented EKF-based attitude determination with 5-state control modes (detumble, coarse/fine pointing, imaging, desaturation).
metrics: Sensors: dual 9-DoF IMU, IR sun sensor, star tracker, science camera
Actuators: reaction wheel (7000 RPM max) + magnetorquers (0.1 Am²)
methods: 5-mode controller: detumble → coarse → fine → imaging → desaturation

projects.title: Air Puck Prototype for Titan
projects.summary: Hexagonal air-puck optimized for fast traverse and payload. CATIA + STAR-CCM+, Arduino control.

projects.title: Hovercraft Prototype & Competition
projects.summary: Skirted hovercraft with internal and external flow modeling. Competed across three courses.

projects.title: Wind-Powered Generator for Rural Guatemala
projects.summary: Low-cost HAWT prototype using local materials. Measured power, efficiency, and TSR.
